data.current_description:
The *Get loan summaries* endpoint returns a summary by integration type of all loans identified from a company's accounting, banking, and commerce integrations.

The endpoint returns a list of a company's [loan summaries](https://docs.codat.io/codat-api#/schemas/LoanSummary) for each valid data connection.

Make sure you have [synced a company](https://docs.codat.io/codat-api#/operations/refresh-company-data) recently before calling the endpoint.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves loan summaries aggregated by integration type for a specified company across all connected accounting, banking, and commerce data sources. Returns a list of LoanSummary objects for each valid data connection. Requires the company to have been recently synced to ensure data accuracy. No authentication or special permissions beyond standard API access are required.
data.reasoning: The current description is reasonably clear but lacks explicit information about what the response contains (structure/schema details), prerequisites for successful execution, and any data freshness considerations. data.current_description:
The _Generate loan transactions_ endpoint requests the generation of the Loan Transactions report.

Learn more about Codat's liabilities feature [here](https://docs.codat.io/lending/features/liabilities-overview).

Make sure you have [synced a company](https://docs.codat.io/codat-api#/operations/refresh-company-data) recently before calling the endpoint.
data.description_suggestion: Initiates generation of the Loan Transactions report, which identifies and analyzes loan obligations from a company's accounting, banking, and commerce integrations. This operation queues the report for asynchronous processing. Requires recent company data synchronization for accurate results. Returns a status object indicating the generation request has been accepted. Use the list endpoint to retrieve completed loan transaction data once generation is complete. Learn more about Codat's liabilities feature in the documentation.
